title: Stories from South & Southeast Asia
description:
Today, Sapphire takes you all over South & Southeast Asia to hear stories submitted by listeners. First stop is Indonesia where a young girl's friends get her into some trouble. Then, you'll visit a haunted apartment in India, stop by a middle school in Vietnam, climb a hungry mountain back in India, and reach your final destination in Cambodia where a family is tormented by an ancestor's past.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
